options.name: Check Alphabetic String Is Valid
options.description: Check if string length contains only letters Info

options.description: Check if string length contains only numbers and letters Info

options.name: Check Boolean String Is Valid
options.description: Check if string is true or false Info

options.name: Check Decimal Number Is Valid
options.description: Check if value is a decimal number Info

options.name: Check Even Number Is Valid
options.description: Check if number is even Info

options.name: Check Greater Element
options.description: Checks if the largest item in a list matches the provided item Info

options.name: Check IP Has Valid Format
options.description: Check if IPv4 or IPv6 address has a valid format Info

options.description: Check if IPv4 address has a valid format Info

options.name: Check IPv6 Has Valid Format
options.description: Check if IPv6 address has a valid format Info

options.name: Check Length List Between
options.description: Check if the length of a list is between two quantities Info

options.name: Check Length List Equal
options.description: Checks if the length of a list equals a specified quantity Info

options.name: Check Length List Greater
options.description: Check if the length of a list is greater than a certain amount Info

options.name: Check Length List Lower
options.description: Info

options.description: Check if the list ends with a specific element Info

options.description: Check if a list is sorted in ascending order Info

options.name: Check List Starts With
options.description: Check if the list starts with a specific element Info

options.name: Check Lower Element
options.description: Checks if the smallest element in a list matches the provided element Info

options.name: Check Modulus Is Equals
options.description: Check if modulus between two numbers is equal to a value Info

options.name: Check Natural Number Is Valid
options.description: Check if value is a natural number Info

options.name: Check Number Is Between
options.description: Check if number is between two values Info

options.description: Check if number is equal to another Info

options.description: Check if number is greater or equal than another Info

options.description: Check if number is lower or equal than another Info

options.description: Check if string length contains only numbers Info

options.description: Check if number is odd Info

options.description: Check if number is prime Info

options.description: Check if string contains a character Info

options.description: Check if string ends with a character Info

options.description: Check if string has no content Info

options.name: Check String Is Random
options.description: Check if string contains random characters without sense Info

options.name: Check String Is Valid By Pattern
options.description: Check if string contains a value that matches with a regular expression Info

options.name: Check String Length Is Between
options.description: Check if string length is between two numbers Info

options.name: Check String Length Is Equal
options.description: Check if string length is equal to number Info

options.description: Check if string length is lower or equal than number Info

options.description: Check if string starts with a character Info

options.description: Check if string only contains lowercase characters Info

options.description: Check if string only contains uppercase characters Info

options.name: Check Unique Es List
options.description: Check if a list consists of unique elements Info

options.name: Check Valid List
options.description: Check if the supplied values ​​form a valid list of elements Info

options.description: Check if the number of words in a sentence equals a certain amount Info

options.description: Check if the number of words in a sentence is greater than a certain amount Info

options.description: Check if the number of words in a sentence is greater than or equal to a certain amount Info

options.description: Info

options.name: Get BASE64 Value
options.description: Convert a string to a BASE64 encoded value Info

options.name: Get Banned Words
options.description: Discover English banned words in the email body or subject Info

options.name: Get Field Type By Value
options.description:
Get field name, analyzing field value provided.

Supported values: Email, Domain, Isbn, Ean, Upc, Dni, Nie, Cif, Date, Gender (male, female), Landline, Mobile phone, Zip code, Web address Info

options.name: Get Formatted String By Pattern
options.description: It allows to format a string using a format pattern Info

options.name: Get Generated Text By Pattern
options.description: Generate a random string using a regular expression as a pattern Info

options.name: Get Greater Element
options.description: Returns the largest item in a list Info

options.name: Get HTML Code From Markdown
options.description: Convert Markdown code to HTML code Info

options.name: Get Lower Element
options.description: Returns the smallest item in a list Info

options.name: Get Lowercased Text
options.description: Convert all letters found in a string to lowercase Info

options.name: Get MD5 String
options.description: Convert a string to a MD5 encoded value Info

options.name: Get Markdown Text From HTML
options.description: Convert HTML code to Markdown code Info

options.name: Get Merged Values By Text
options.description: Join a character or string to join two values Info

options.name: Get Normalized String By Field
options.description: Normalize a string depending on the field name Info

options.name: Get Parsed Text
options.description: Analyze string and return all emails, phones, zipcodes and links detected Info

options.name: Get SHA String
options.description: Convert a string to a SHA encoded value Info

options.name: Get Sentiment From A Text
options.description: It allows to analyze an english text with Emojis and detect sentiment Info

options.name: Get Sorted List
options.description: Returns an ascending sorted list Info

options.name: Get Spin String
options.description: Generates a spin string Info

options.name: Get Splitted And Merged Values By Separator
options.description: Split a value in two parts and join them, using a separator present in the original string Info

options.name: Get Splitted Values By Separator
options.description: Split a value in two parts, using a separator present in the original string Info

options.name: Get String Length
options.description: Get length of a string Info

options.name: Get String VLookup
options.description: Lookup string between multiple values by fuzzy logic and regex patterns Info

options.name: Get Text Cleaned Without Abuse Words
options.description: Clean abuse words from a string Info

options.name: Get Text Replaced By String
options.description: Replace first value found in a string by another Info

options.name: Get Text Without HTML
options.description: Extract text from HTML, removing html tags and replacing special tags Info

options.name: Get Texts Replaced By String
options.description: Replace all values found in a string by another Info

options.name: Get Translated Text
options.description: It allows to translate a text to any language Info

options.name: Get Unique List
options.description: Returns a single list, with no repeating elements Info

options.name: Get Uppercased Text
options.description: Convert all letters found in a string to uppercase Info

options.name: Get Words Count
options.description: Count total words in a text Info
